_header: And all the tother that were their purse
_description: One leaf of a poem on King Arthur, possibly a version of the Morte d’Arthur, containing the victory of the Britons over the Roman

BodRawD913.First Lines:
…& alle þe toþer þat were þer persAnd
                    seid ȝif it be wonnen…
BodRawD913.Last Lines:
…& presentid Arthur with Ilk onAnd he þankid his
                    messagers…
